roleset.name: assign into a category
roleset.note: CATEGORIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'categorize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Categorization. That was a toughie. (from categorize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usually passive?
example.text: The MIT project devised ways for [E-mail]*-1 to be automatically categorized [*-1]as top priority if it comes from certain designated senders or requires action in the next couple of days.
example.arg: if it comes from certain designated senders or requires action in the next couple of days
